author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

The PR let's the existing HLT key @relval2018 point to the Fake2 menu (instead of GRun) for relvals, and adds and uses the new HLT key @relval2021 pointing to the GRun menu in 2021 Run-3 relvals.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests and short matrix tests all pass

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Not a backport, CMSSW_11 only, no backport to 10_6 or earlier foreseen.
title: Switch HLT menus for 110X
